messages.title: We'll protect NHS frontline services
messages.content: Labour's London health bosses are planning to make cuts at Whipps Cross Hospital. Only Farid Ahmed and the Liberal Democrats will protect the vital services we all rely on.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to protect frontline services at Whipps Cross Hospital from proposed cuts.

issues.health: Protecting NHS services at Whipps Cross Hospital from cuts. The hospital is on a financially challenged list and facing a £6.6m deficit. Proposals to cut 174 beds.

quotes.text: Waltham Forest is projecting a worst case £6.6m deficit at the end of the year, although spending at Whipps Cross Hospital could overshoot target by £7.6m.
quotes.source: British Medical Association's report 'On the Brink'

images.caption: Farid Ahmed and his local Lib Dem team are fighting to protect our local NHS services.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Supporters can sign up to support protecting Whipps Cross Hospital from cuts using a sign-up form provided in the leaflet. A call for donations to help the Liberal Democrat campaign is also present.
